sourcesContent: import { Code, Heading, Pane, Text } from 'evergreen-ui'; import React from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import YouTube from 'react-youtube'; const Spacer = ({ size = 1 }) => ( ); function Home() { return ( aster haven (@therebelrobot) - software, hardware, gardenware aster haven they/them or she/her software full-stack web development, node.js, react.js, docker, infrastructure, systems administration, devops and scaling medium.com sr software engineer 2019-present san francisco gay men's chorus archive team 2018-present saleae sr software engineer 2017-2019 segment software engineer 2016-2017 code for san francisco core team 2015-2017 mashape software engineer 2015-2016 node.js website working group 2014-2015 contact for additional information about employment history, including independent contracting, business ventures, or for a full resume, please reach out at inquiries at therebelrobot.com music san francisco gay men's chorus the san francisco gay men's chorus provides community support through outreach, performances, and anti-bullying curriculum to nearby schools. 2017-2018, Low Bass. theForgeProject a musical side-project, producing smooth rhythmic future-bass with a strong walking beat. started in 2016. For usage rights or booking, please reach out at{' '} inquiries at therebelrobot.com ); } export default Home;
